trans-unit.source: Occasionally, these updates require a forced-recompile of the formula itself or its dependents to either ensure formulae continue to function as expected or to close a security issue. This forced-recompile is known as a revision and is inserted underneath the homepage/url/sha256 block.
trans-unit.target: 有时，这些更新需要对公式本身或其依赖项进行强制重新编译，以确保公式继续按预期运行，或解决安全问题。这种强制重新编译称为 revision ，它被插入到 homepage / url / sha256 块下面。

trans-unit.target: 在GitHub上，您的存储库必须命名为 homebrew-something ，以便使用 brew tap 参数的单参数形式。前缀“ homebrew-”不是可选的。（两个参数的形式没有此限制，但它会强制您显式提供完整的URL。）

trans-unit.source: Once all feedback has been addressed and if it’s a change we want to include (we include most changes), then we’ll add your commit to Homebrew. Note that the PR status may show up as “Closed” instead of “Merged” because of the way we merge contributions. Don’t worry: you will still get author credit in the actual merged commit.
trans-unit.target: 解决了所有反馈后，如果我们要包含所有更改（我们包含了大多数更改），那么我们会将您的提交添加到Homebrew。请注意，由于我们合并捐款的方式，PR状态可能显示为“已关闭”，而不是“已合并”。不用担心：您仍然会在实际的合并提交中获得作者的荣誉。

trans-unit.source: Once you’ve created the pull request in the appropriate Homebrew repository your commit(s) will be tested on our continuous integration servers, showing a green check mark if everything passed or a red X if there were failures. Maintainers will review your pull request and provide feedback about any changes that need to be made before it can be merged.
trans-unit.target: 在适当的Homebrew存储库中创建拉取请求后，您的提交将在我们的持续集成服务器上进行测试，如果一切都通过了，将显示绿色的复选标记，如果失败则显示红色的X。维护人员将审核您的拉取请求，并提供有关合并之前需要进行的任何更改的反馈。

trans-unit.source: Once your tap is installed, Homebrew will update it each time a user runs brew update. Outdated formulae will be upgraded when a user runs brew upgrade, like core formulae.
trans-unit.target: 安装水龙头后，每次用户运行 brew update 时，Homebrew都会对其进行更新。用户运行 brew upgrade ，将升级过期的公式，例如核心公式。

trans-unit.source: One formula per commit; one commit per formula.
trans-unit.target: 每项承诺一个公式;每个公式一个承诺。

trans-unit.source: One of the most frequent errors that we’ve encountered is: 7003: Method does not exist. Since Ruby is a very dynamic language, methods can be defined in ways Sorbet cannot see statically. In such cases, check if the method exists at runtime, if not, then Sorbet has caught a future bug! But, it is also possible that even though a method exists at runtime, Sorbet cannot see it. In such cases, we use .rbi files.
trans-unit.target: 我们遇到的最常见的错误之一是： 7003: Method does not exist. 由于Ruby是一种非常动态的语言，因此可以用Sorbet无法静态看到的方法来定义方法。在这种情况下，请检查该方法是否在运行时存在，否则，Sorbet已捕获到将来的错误！但是，即使在运行时存在某个方法，Sorbet也可能看不到它。在这种情况下，我们使用 .rbi 文件。

trans-unit.source: One of the most frequent errors that we’ve encountered is: 7003: Method does not exist. Since Ruby is a very dynamic language, methods can be defined in ways Sorbet cannot see statically. In such cases, check if the method exists at runtime, if not, then Sorbet has caught a future bug! But, it is also possible that even though a method exists at runtime, Sorbet cannot see it. In such cases, we use *.rbi files. Read more about RBI files here.
trans-unit.target: 我们遇到的最常见的错误之一是： 7003: Method does not exist. 由于Ruby是一种非常动态的语言，因此可以用Sorbet无法静态看到的方法来定义方法。在这种情况下，请检查该方法是否在运行时存在，否则，Sorbet已捕获到将来的错误！但是，即使在运行时存在某个方法，Sorbet也可能看不到它。在这种情况下，我们使用 *.rbi 文件。在此处阅读有关RBI文件的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: One reason is executables go in /usr/local/bin. Usually this isn’t a writable location. But if you installed Homebrew as we recommend, /usr/local will be writable without sudo. So now you are good to install the development tools you need without risking the use of sudo.
trans-unit.target: 原因之一是可执行文件位于 /usr/local/bin 中。通常这不是可写的位置。但是，如果按照我们的建议安装了Homebrew，则无需sudo即可写入 /usr/local 。因此，现在您可以很好地安装所需的开发工具，而不必冒险使用sudo了。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the URL root used to calculate bottle URLs. By default this is omitted and the Homebrew default bottle URL root is used. This may be useful for taps which wish to provide bottles for their formulae or to cater for a non-default HOMEBREW_CELLAR.
trans-unit.target: （可选）包含用于计算瓶子URL的URL根。默认情况下，将省略此名称，并使用Homebrew默认瓶URL根。这对于希望为其配方提供瓶子或迎合非默认 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 的水龙头很有用。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the rebuild version of the bottle. Sometimes bottles may need be updated without bumping the version of the formula, e.g. a new patch was applied. In that case the rebuild will have a value of 1 or more.
trans-unit.target: 可选地包含瓶子的重建版本。有时瓶子可能需要更新而不影响公式的版本,例如应用了一个新的补丁。在这种情况下,重建的值将为1或更多。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the value of HOMEBREW_CELLAR in which the bottles were built. Most compiled software contains references to its compiled location so cannot be simply relocated anywhere on disk. If this value is :any or :any_skip_relocation this means that the bottle can be safely installed in any Cellar as it did not contain any references to its installation Cellar. This can be omitted if a bottle is compiled (as all default Homebrew ones are) for the default HOMEBREW_CELLAR of /usr/local/Cellar.
trans-unit.target: （可选）包含在其中构建瓶子的 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 的值。大多数已编译软件都包含对其已编译位置的引用，因此不能简单地将其重新放置在磁盘上的任何位置。如果此值是 :any 或 :any_skip_relocation ,则表示该瓶子可以安全地安装在任何酒窖中，因为它不包含任何对其安装酒窖的引用。如果为 /usr/local/Cellar 的默认 HOMEBREW_CELLAR 编译了一个瓶子（就像所有默认的Homebrew一样），则可以省略该变量。

trans-unit.source: Optionally contains the value of HOMEBREW_PREFIX in which the bottles were built. See description of cellar. When cellar is :any or :any_skip_relocation the prefix should be omitted.
trans-unit.target: （可选）包含在其中构建瓶子的 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 的值。见 cellar 描述。当 cellar 为 :any 或 :any_skip_relocation 时，前缀应省略。

trans-unit.source: Optionally returns a boolean to decide whether a bottle should be used for this formula. For example a bottle may break if another formula has been compiled with non-default options, so this method could check for that case and return false.
trans-unit.target: （可选）返回一个布尔值，以决定是否应将瓶子用于此公式。例如，如果使用非默认选项编译了另一个公式，则瓶子可能会破裂，因此此方法可以检查这种情况并返回 false 。

trans-unit.target: 选项已传递给install命令，即 brew install <formula> 将使用该公式的瓶装版本，但是 brew install --enable-bar <formula> 将触发源代码构建。

trans-unit.source: Originally Homebrew was a build-from-source package manager and all user environment variables and non-Homebrew-installed software were available to builds. Since then Homebrew added Requirements to specify dependencies on non-Homebrew software (such as those provided by brew cask like X11/XQuartz), the superenv build system to strip out unspecified dependencies, environment filtering to stop the user environment leaking into Homebrew builds and default_formula to specify that a Requirement can be satisfied by a particular formula.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew最初是一个从源代码构建的软件包管理器，并且所有用户环境变量和未安装Homebrew的软件都可以构建。从那时起，Homebrew添加了 Requirement ,以指定对非Homebrew软件的依赖（例如X11 / XQuartz之类的 brew cask superenv 提供的软件），superenv构建系统去除未指定的依赖关系，环境过滤以防止用户环境泄漏到Homebrew构建中，并且 default_formula ,用于指定特定公式可以满足 Requirement 。

trans-unit.source: Our policy is that formulae in the core tap (homebrew/core) must be open-source with an OSI-approved license and either built from source or produce cross-platform binaries (e.g. Java, Mono). Binary-only formulae should go to homebrew/cask.
trans-unit.target: 我们的政策是，核心分接头（homebrew / core）中的公式必须是开放源代码且具有OSI批准的许可证，并且必须由源代码构建或生成跨平台的二进制文件（例如Java，Mono）。仅限二进制的公式应该放在homebrew / cask中。

trans-unit.source: Our policy is that formulae in the core tap (homebrew/core) must be open-source with an Debian Free Software Guidelines license and either built from source or produce cross-platform binaries (e.g. Java, Mono). Binary-only formulae should go to homebrew/cask.
trans-unit.target: 我们的政策是，核心分接头（homebrew / core）中的公式必须是开放源码的，并具有Debian Free Software Guidelines许可，并且可以从源代码构建或生成跨平台的二进制文件（例如Java，Mono）。仅二进制公式应转到homebrew / cask。

trans-unit.source: Please do not manually create a release based on older commits on the master branch. It’s very hard to judge whether these have been sufficiently tested by users or if they will cause negative side-effects with the current state of Homebrew/homebrew-core. If a new branch is needed ASAP but there are things on master that cannot be released yet (e.g. new deprecations and you want to make a patch release) then revert the relevant PRs, follow the process above and then revert the reverted PRs to reapply them on master.
trans-unit.target: 请不要基于 master 分支上的较旧提交手动创建发行版。很难判断用户是否对它们进行了充分的测试，或者它们是否会对Homebrew / homebrew-core的当前状态产生负面影响。如果需要尽快建立一个新分支，但 master 上有一些尚无法发布的内容（例如，新的过时版本和您想发布补丁的版本），请还原相关的PR，按照上面的过程操作，然后还原已还原的PR以重新应用它们在 master 。

trans-unit.source: Please note that our preferred commit message format for simple version updates is “<FORMULA_NAME> <NEW_VERSION>”, e.g. “source-highlight 3.1.8” but devel version updates should have the commit message suffixed with (devel), e.g. “nginx 1.9.1 (devel)”. If updating both stable and devel, the format should be a concatenation of these two forms, e.g. “x264 r2699, r2705 (devel)”.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于简单版本更新，我们首选的提交消息格式为“ <FORMULA_NAME> <NEW_VERSION> ”，例如“ source-highlight 3.1.8 ”，但 devel 版本更新的提交消息应带有 (devel) 后缀，例如“ nginx 1.9.1 (devel) ”。如果同时更新 stable 和 devel ，则格式应为这两种形式的串联，例如“ x264 r2699, r2705 (devel) ”。

trans-unit.source: Setuptools provides the easy_install command, which is an end-user package management tool that fetches and installs packages from PyPI, the Python Package Index. pip is another, newer end-user package management tool, which is also provided outside the standard library. While pip supplants easy_install, pip does not replace the other functionality of the setuptools module.
trans-unit.target: Setuptools提供了 easy_install 命令，这是一个最终用户程序包管理工具，可从PyPI（Python程序包索引）获取并安装程序包。 pip 是另一个较新的最终用户包管理工具，它也在标准库之外提供。尽管pip替代了 easy_install ，但pip不会替代setuptools模块的其他功能。

trans-unit.source: Setuptools requires that SVEM is used in conjunction with --record, which provides a list of files that can later be used to uninstall the package. We don’t need or want this because Homebrew can manage uninstallation but since setuptools demands it we comply. The Homebrew convention is to call the record file “installed.txt”.
trans-unit.target: Setuptools要求SVEM与 --record 结合使用，后者提供了文件列表，这些文件以后可用于卸载软件包。我们不需要或不需要这样做，因为Homebrew可以管理卸载，但是由于setuptools要求我们遵守。自制程序的约定是将记录文件称为“ installed.txt”。

trans-unit.source: Setuptools, Pip, etc.
trans-unit.target: Setuptools、Pip等。

trans-unit.source: Since Sorbet does not automatically assume that Kernel is to be included in Modules, we may encounter many errors while trying to use methods like puts, ohai, odebug et cetera. A simple workaround for this would be to add an extra include Kernel line in the respective RBI file.
trans-unit.target: 由于Sorbet不会自动假定模块中将包含内核，因此在尝试使用 puts ， ohai ， odebug 等方法时，我们可能会遇到许多错误。一个简单的解决方法是在相应的RBI文件中添加一个额外的 include Kernel 行。

trans-unit.source: So we let software be. Installing it with Homebrew Cask should make it behave the same as if you had installed it manually. But we also want to support software that does not auto-upgrade, so we add auto_updates true to casks of software that can do it, which excludes them from brew upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 因此，我们顺其自然。使用Homebrew Cask进行安装时，其行为应与手动安装时的行为相同。但是，我们还希望支持不会自动升级的软件，因此我们向可以执行此操作的软件添加 auto_updates true ，这将它们排除在 brew upgrade 。

trans-unit.source: Some casks should not go in homebrew/cask. But there are additional Interesting Taps and Forks and anyone can start their own!
trans-unit.target: 有些酒桶不应该放在自制酒/酒桶中。但是，还有其他有趣的水龙头和叉子，任何人都可以自己开始！

trans-unit.source: Some formulae are marked as “keg-only”, meaning that installed files are not linked to the shared bin, lib, etc. directories, as doing so can cause conflicts. Such formulae can be forced to link to the shared directories, but doing so is not recommended (and will cause brew doctor to complain.)
trans-unit.target: 有些公式标记为“仅插入”，这意味着已安装的文件未链接到共享 bin ， lib 等目录，因为这样做可能会导致冲突。可以强制将这样的公式链接到共享目录，但是不建议这样做（这会导致 brew doctor 抱怨）。

trans-unit.source: Some formulae have multiple licenses that need to be combined in different ways. In these cases, a more complex license expression can be used. These expressions are based on the SPDX License Expression Guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 某些公式具有多个许可证，需要以不同的方式进行组合。在这些情况下，可以使用更复杂的许可证表达。这些表述基于SPDX许可表述指南。

trans-unit.source: Some formulae provide Python bindings.
trans-unit.target: 一些公式提供了Python绑定。

trans-unit.source: Some formulae provide Python bindings. Sometimes a --with-python or --with-python@2 option has to be passed to brew install in order to build the Python bindings. (Check with brew options <formula>.)

trans-unit.source: Some upstream software providers like to package their software in their own Homebrew tap. When their software is eligible for Homebrew/homebrew-core we prefer to maintain software there for ease of updates, improved discoverability and use of tools such as formulae.brew.sh.
trans-unit.target: 一些上游软件提供商喜欢将其软件打包在自己的Homebrew龙头中。当他们的软件有资格使用Homebrew / homebrew-core时，我们倾向于在此维护软件，以方便更新，提高发现能力和使用诸如Formulae.brew.sh之类的工具。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a package fails to build when using a certain compiler. Since recent Xcode versions no longer include a GCC compiler we cannot simply force the use of GCC. Instead, the correct way to declare this is the fails_with DSL method. A properly constructed fails_with block documents the latest compiler build version known to cause compilation to fail, and the cause of the failure. For example:
trans-unit.target: 有时，使用某些编译器时，软件包无法构建。由于最新的Xcode版本不再包含GCC编译器，因此我们不能简单地强制使用GCC。相反，正确的声明方式是 fails_with DSL方法。正确构造的 fails_with 块记录了已知会导致编译失败的最新编译器构建版本以及失败的原因。例如：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes formulae have version schemes that change such that a direct comparison between two versions no longer produces the correct result. For example, a project might be version 13 and then decide to become 1.0.0. As 13 is translated to 13.0.0 by our versioning system by default this requires intervention.
trans-unit.target: 有时公式的版本方案会发生变化，以至于两个版本之间的直接比较不再产生正确的结果。例如，一个项目可能是版本 13 ，然后决定成为 1.0.0 。由于默认情况下我们的版本控制系统将 13 转换为 13.0.0 ，因此需要干预。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is necessary to explicitly include the Kernel module in order for Sorbet to know that methods such as puts are available in a given context. This is mostly necessary for modules since they can be used in both BasicObjects (which don’t include Kernel) and Objects (which include Kernel by default). In this case, it is necessary to create an .rbi file (example) since re-including the Kernel module in actual code can break things.
trans-unit.target: 有时有必要明确包含 Kernel 模块，以便Sorbet知道在给定上下文中可以使用诸如 puts 之类的方法。这对于模块来说是最必要的，因为它们可以在 BasicObject （不包含 Kernel ）和 Object （默认情况下包含 Kernel ）中使用。在这种情况下，有必要创建一个 .rbi 文件（示例），因为在实际代码中重新包含 Kernel 模块可能会破坏事情。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it’s faster to download a file via means other than those strategies that are available as part of Homebrew. For example, Erlang provides a torrent that’ll let you download at 4–5× the normal HTTP method.
trans-unit.target: 有时，通过Homebrew所提供的那些策略以外的其他方式下载文件会更快。例如，Erlang提供了一个洪流，可让您以普通HTTP方法的4-5倍下载。

trans-unit.source: Submitted by a maintainer or prolific contributor. A big part of the reasoning for the notability rule is unpopular software garners less attention and the cask gets abandoned, outdated, and broken. Someone with a proven investment in Hombrew Cask is less likely to let that happen for software they depend on.

trans-unit.source: Tap formulae follow the same format as the core’s ones, and can be added at the repository’s root, or under Formula or HomebrewFormula subdirectories. We recommend the latter options because it makes the repository organisation easier to grasp, and top-level files are not mixed with formulae.
trans-unit.target: Tap公式遵循与核心公式相同的格式，可以添加到存储库的根目录中，也可以添加到 Formula 或 HomebrewFormula 子目录下。我们建议使用后一种方法，因为它使存储库组织更容易掌握，并且顶级文件不会与公式混合。

trans-unit.source: Tap formulae follow the same format as the core’s ones, and can be added under either the Formula subdirectory, the HomebrewFormula subdirectory or the repository’s root. The first available directory is used, other locations will be ignored. We recommend use of subdirectories because it makes the repository organisation easier to grasp, and top-level files are not mixed with formulae.
trans-unit.target: Tap公式遵循与核心公式相同的格式，可以添加到 Formula 子目录， HomebrewFormula 子目录或存储库的根目录下。使用第一个可用目录，其他位置将被忽略。我们建议使用子目录，因为它使存储库组织更容易掌握，并且顶级文件不会与公式混合。

trans-unit.source: Tap names like homebrew/core are styled in fixed width font. Repository names may be styled in either fixed width font like “Homebrew/homebrew-core”, as links like “Homebrew/homebrew-core”, or regular text like “Homebrew/homebrew-core”, based on which looks best for a given use.
trans-unit.target: 点按名称（如 homebrew/core 以 fixed width font 设置样式。存储库名称可以使用固定宽度的字体（例如“ Homebrew/homebrew-core ”）（如“ Homebrew / homebrew-core ”）链接，也可以使用常规文本（例如“ Homebrew / homebrew-core”）设置样式，这取决于给定的外观用。

trans-unit.source: Test your changes by running the following, and ensure they all pass without issue. For changed formulae, make sure you do the brew audit step while your changed formula is installed.

trans-unit.source: Testing and auditing the formula

trans-unit.source: Tests the full lifecycle of a Homebrew change to a tap (Git repository). For example, for a GitHub Actions pull request that changes a formula brew test-bot will ensure the system is cleaned and set up to test the formula, install the formula, run various tests and checks on it, bottle (package) the binaries and test formulae that depend on it to ensure they aren’t broken by these changes.
trans-unit.target: 测试Homebrew更改到Tap（Git存储库）的整个生命周期。例如，对于GitHub动作请求，它更改了配方 brew test-bot 以确保系统已清理并设置为测试配方，安装配方，运行各种测试并对其进行检查，瓶装（包装）二进制文件和测试依赖它的公式，以确保它们不会被这些更改所破坏。

trans-unit.source: The config file is a newline-separated list of arguments to pass to srb tc, the same as if they’d been passed at the command-line. Arguments in the config file are always passed first, followed by arguments provided on the command-line. We use it to ignore Gem directories which we do not wish to type check.
trans-unit.target: 该 config 文件是参数换行分隔的列表传递给 srb tc ，一样的，如果他们想在命令行中通过。始终首先传递配置文件中的参数，然后传递命令行中提供的参数。我们用它来忽略我们不希望输入check的Gem目录。

trans-unit.source: The config file. It is actually a newline-separated list of arguments to pass to srb tc, the same as if they’d been passed at the command line. Arguments in the config file are always passed first (if it exists), followed by arguments provided on the command line. We use it ignore the Library/Homebrew/vendor directory, which contains gem definitions which we do not wish to type check.
trans-unit.target: 该 config 文件。实际上，这是一个以换行符分隔的参数列表，以传递给 srb tc ，就像在命令行中传递它们一样。始终首先传递配置文件中的参数（如果存在），然后传递命令行中提供的参数。我们使用它忽略 Library/Homebrew/vendor 目录，该目录包含我们不希望键入check的gem定义。

trans-unit.source: The date parameter should be set to the date that the project or version became (or will become) deprecated. If there is no clear date but the formula needs to be deprecated, use today’s date. If the date parameter is set to a date in the future, the formula will not become deprecated until that date. This can be useful if the upstream developers have indicated a date where the project or version will stop being supported.
trans-unit.target: 该 date 参数应设置为不提倡使用的项目或版本成为（或即将）的日期。如果没有明确的日期，但需要弃用该公式，请使用今天的日期。如果 date 参数设置为将来的日期，则该公式直到该日期才会被弃用。如果上游开发人员已指定停止支持该项目或版本的日期，则此功能很有用。

trans-unit.source: The date parameter should be set to the date that the reason for disabling came into effect. If there is no clear date but the formula needs to be disabled, use today’s date. If the date parameter is set to a date in the future, the formula will be deprecated until that date (on which the formula will become disabled).
trans-unit.target: 该 date 参数应设置为禁用的原因生效的日期。如果没有明确的日期，但需要禁用该公式，请使用今天的日期。如果 date 参数设置为将来的日期，则该公式将被弃用，直到该日期为止（该日期将禁用该公式）。

trans-unit.source: The livecheck block regex restricts matches to a subset of the fetched content and uses a capture group around the version text.
trans-unit.target: 该 livecheck 块正则表达式匹配限制在获取内容的子集，并使用捕获组周围的版本文本。

trans-unit.source: The rbi/ directory. It contains all Ruby Interface files, which help Sorbet to learn about constants, ancestors, and methods defined in ways it doesn’t understand natively. RBI files for all gems are auto-generated using Tapioca. We can also create a RBI file to help Sorbet understand dynamic definitions. For example: Sorbet assumes that Kernel is not necessarily included in our modules and classes, hence we use RBI files to explicitly include the Kernel Module. Here is an example in our codebase.
trans-unit.target: 该 rbi/ 目录。它包含所有Ruby Interface文件，这些文件可帮助Sorbet了解以其本机无法理解的方式定义的常量，祖先和方法。所有宝石的RBI文件都是使用Tapioca自动生成的。我们还可以创建一个RBI文件来帮助Sorbet了解动态定义。例如：Sorbet假定 Kernel 不一定包含在我们的模块和类中，因此我们使用RBI文件明确包含内核模块。这是我们代码库中的一个示例。

trans-unit.source: The Homebrew package manager may be used on Linux and Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL). Homebrew was formerly referred to as Linuxbrew when running on Linux or WSL. It can be installed in your home directory, in which case it does not use sudo. Homebrew does not use any libraries provided by your host system, except glibc and gcc if they are new enough. Homebrew can install its own current versions of glibc and gcc for older distributions of Linux.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew软件包管理器可用于Linux和Linux的Windows子系统（WSL）。在Linux或WSL上运行时，Homebrew以前被称为Linuxbrew。它可以安装在您的主目录中，在这种情况下，它不使用sudo。Homebrew不使用主机系统提供的任何库，但glibc和gcc（如果足够新的话）除外。Homebrew可以为较早的Linux发行版安装自己的当前版本的glibc和gcc。

trans-unit.source: The Homebrew user agent, e.g. Homebrew/0.9.9 (Macintosh; Intel macOS 10.12.0) curl/7.43.0
trans-unit.target: Homebrew用户代理，例如 Homebrew/0.9.9 (Macintosh; Intel macOS 10.12.0) curl/7.43.0

trans-unit.source: The Homebrew user agent, e.g. Homebrew/2.5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15.6) curl/7.64.1.

trans-unit.source: The PLC consists of five members. Committee members are elected by majority vote of Homebrew members. Each PLC member will serve a term of two years or until the member’s successor is elected. Any sudden vacancy in the PLC will be filled by the usual procedure for electing PLC members at the next general meeting, typically the next AGM.
trans-unit.target: PLC由五个成员组成。委员会成员由本土成员的多数票选举产生。每个PLC成员的任期为两年，或者直到选举出其继任者为止。PLC下的任何突然空缺将由在下届股东大会（通常是下届股东周年大会）上选举PLC成员的常规程序来填补。

trans-unit.source: The PLC may meet by any mutually agreeable means, such as text chat, voice or video call, and in person. Members of the PLC must meet at least once per quarter. Members of the PLC must meet by video call or in person at least once per year.
trans-unit.target: 可通过任何双方同意的方式,如短信聊天、语音或视频通话和亲自开会。临委会成员必须每季度至少召开一次会议。巴勒斯坦立法委员会成员必须每年至少通过视频电话或亲自出席一次会议。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will announce candidates and proposals three weeks prior to the election date.
trans-unit.target: 臨立會將於選舉日期前三星期公布候選人及建議。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will appoint between three and five members to the TSC. The Project Leader must be one of these appointees. After the 2021 AGM, PLC members should not be any of these appointees. Appointed TSC members will serve a term of one year or until the member’s successor is appointed.
trans-unit.target: PLC将在TSC中任命三到五个成员。项目负责人必须是这些任命的人之一。在2021年股东周年大会之后，PLC成员不应是这些任命的任何人。被任命的TSC成员的任期为一年，或者直到任命该成员的继任者为止。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will appoint between three and five members to the TSC. The Project Leader must be one of these appointees. Appointed TSC members will serve a term of one year or until the member’s successor is appointed.
trans-unit.target: PLC将在TSC中任命三到五个成员。项目负责人必须是这些任命的人之一。任命的TSC成员的任期为一年或直到任命成员的继任者为止。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will appoint the members of the TSC.
trans-unit.target: 臨立會將委任交通督導委員會的成員。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will appoint the members of the Technical Steering Committee (TSC).
trans-unit.target: 臨立會將委任技術指導委員會的成員。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will deliver a report of their activities, decisions, and financial statements to the Homebrew members at the AGM.
trans-unit.target: PLC将在年度大会上向自酿会员提交活动、决定和财务报表的报告。

trans-unit.source: The PLC will meet annually to review the status of all members and remove inactive members and those who have not affirmed a commitment to Homebrew in the past year. Voting in the AGM confirms that a member wishes to remain active with the project. After the AGM, the PLC will ask the members who did not vote whether they wish to remain active with the project. The PLC removes any members who don’t respond to this second request after three weeks.
trans-unit.target: PLC将每年召开一次会议，审查所有成员的状态，并删除不活跃的成员以及在过去一年中未确认对Homebrew承诺的成员。在年度股东大会上投票确认成员希望继续参与该项目。年度股东大会结束后，PLC将询问未投票的成员是否希望继续参与该项目。PLC将删除三周后未响应第二个请求的所有成员。

trans-unit.source: The Project Leader may not be a member of the PLC.
trans-unit.target: 项目负责人不得为PLC成员。

trans-unit.source: The Project Leader will be elected annually by a majority vote of Homebrew members. The PLC will nominate at least one candidate for Project Leader. Any member may nominate a candidate, or self-nominate. Nominations must be announced to the membership three weeks before the AGM.
trans-unit.target: 项目负责人将每年由Homebrew成员的多数票选出。PLC将至少提名一名项目负责人的候选人。任何会员都可以提名候选人,或自我提名。提名必须在AGM前三周向会员公布。

trans-unit.source: The Project Leader will represent Homebrew publicly, and manage all day-to-day technical decisions related to the operation of Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: 项目负责人将公开代表Homebrew,并管理所有与Homebrew运营相关的日常技术决策。

trans-unit.source: The Project Leader will represent Homebrew publicly, manage all day-to-day technical decisions, and resolve disputes related to the operation of Homebrew between maintainers, members, other contributors, and users.
trans-unit.target: 项目负责人将公开代表Homebrew,管理所有日常技术决策,并解决维护者、成员、其他贡献者和用户之间与Homebrew运营有关的争议。

trans-unit.source: The Python formulae install pip (as pip3) and Setuptools.
trans-unit.target: Python公式会安装pip（作为 pip3 ）和Setuptools。

trans-unit.source: The Python formulae install pip (as pip or pip2) and Setuptools.
trans-unit.target: Python公式会安装pip（作为 pip 或 pip2 ）和Setuptools。

trans-unit.source: The TSC has the authority to decide on any technical matter, including technical disputes between Homebrew members.
trans-unit.target: TSC有权决定任何技术问题,包括Homebrew成员之间的技术纠纷。

trans-unit.source: The TSC has the authority to decide on any technical matter, including technical disputes between Homebrew members. The TSC will also decide the long-term roadmap of Homebrew, including large features or major changes to the Homebrew software.
trans-unit.target: TSC有权决定任何技术问题,包括Homebrew成员之间的技术纠纷。TSC还将决定Homebrew的长期发展方向,包括Homebrew软件的大型功能或重大变化。

trans-unit.source: The app can’t be opened because it is from an unidentified developer
trans-unit.target: 无法打开该应用程序，因为它来自身份不明的开发人员

trans-unit.source: The app has been rejected before due to an issue we cannot fix, and the new submission doesn’t fix that. An example would be the first submission of soapui, whose installation problems were not fixed in the two subsequent submissions (#9969, #10606).
trans-unit.target: 由于我们无法解决的问题，该应用之前已被拒绝，而新提交的应用也无法解决该问题。一个示例是 soapui 的第一次提交，其安装问题未在随后的两个提交中解决（＃9969和＃10606）。

trans-unit.source: The app is a trial version, and the only way to acquire the full version is through the Mac App Store.
trans-unit.target: 该应用为试用版,只有通过Mac App Store才能获得完整版。

trans-unit.source: The app is both open-source and CLI-only (i.e. it only uses the binary artifact). In that case, and in the spirit of deduplication, submit it first to Homebrew/core as a formula that builds from source. If it is rejected, you may then try again as a cask (link us to the issue so we can see the discussion and reasoning for rejection).
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序既是开源的，也仅是CLI的（即，仅使用 binary 工件）。在这种情况下，本着重复数据删除的精神，请先将其提交给Homebrew / core，作为从源构建的公式。如果被拒绝，您可以再次尝试（将我们链接到该问题，以便我们查看拒绝的讨论和理由）。

trans-unit.source: The app is open-source and has a GUI but no compiled versions (or only old ones) are provided. It’s better to have them in Homebrew so users don’t get perpetually outdated versions. See gedit for example.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序是开源的，具有GUI，但未提供已编译的版本（或仅提供旧版本）。最好将它们放在Homebrew中，这样用户就不会获得永久过时的版本。例如，请参见 gedit 。

trans-unit.source: The author has specifically asked us not to include it.
trans-unit.target: 作者特别要求我们不要包括它。

trans-unit.target: 啤酒表情符号也可以用其他字符代替。

trans-unit.source: The bot automatically builds pull requests and updates their status depending on the result of the job.
trans-unit.target: 机器人会自动建立拉动请求,并根据作业的结果更新其状态。

trans-unit.source: The cask was submitted to the wrong repo. When drafting a cask, consult “Finding a Home For Your Cask” to see where it belongs.
trans-unit.target: 酒桶已提交到错误的回购。在起草酒桶时，请参阅“为酒桶找房子”，以了解酒桶的位置。

trans-unit.source: The code is viewable in analytics.rb and analytics.sh. They are done in a separate background process and fail fast to avoid delaying any execution. They will fail immediately and silently if you have no network connection.
trans-unit.target: 该代码可在 analytics.rb 和 analytics.sh 中查看。它们在单独的后台进程中完成，并且快速失败，以避免延迟任何执行。如果您没有网络连接，它们将立即静默失败。

trans-unit.source: The code is viewable in analytics.rb and analytics.sh. They are done in a separate background process and fail fast to avoid delaying any execution. They will fail immediately and silently if you have no network connection.
trans-unit.target: 该代码可在 analytics.rb 和 analytics.sh 中查看。它们在单独的后台进程中完成，并且快速失败以避免延迟任何执行。如果您没有网络连接，它们将立即安静地失败。

trans-unit.source: The command may Kernel.exit with a status code if it needs to; if it doesn’t explicitly exit then Homebrew will return 0.

trans-unit.source: The current schema version is v1. Note that fields may be added to the schema as needed without incrementing the schema. Any significant breaking changes will cause a change to the schema version.

trans-unit.source: The default for 10.8 and earlier was libstdc++, supported by Apple GCC compilers, GNU GCC compilers, and clang. This was marked deprecated with a warning during compilation as of Xcode 8.
trans-unit.target: Apple GCC编译器，GNU GCC编译器和 clang 支持10.8和更早版本的默认值为libstdc ++。从Xcode 8开始，在编译过程中已使用警告将其标记为已弃用。

trans-unit.source: The default for 10.9 and later is libc++, which is also the default for clang on older platforms when building C++11 code.
trans-unit.target: 10.9和更高版本的默认值为libc ++，这也是在较旧平台上构建C ++ 11代码时 clang 的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The dependencies of libraries must be installed so that they are importable. To minimise the potential for linking conflicts, dependencies should be installed to libexec/<vendor> and added to sys.path by writing a second .pth file (named like “homebrew-foo-dependencies.pth”) to the prefix site-packages.
trans-unit.target: 必须安装库的依赖项，以便它们可以导入。为了最大程度地减少链接冲突的可能性，应将依赖项安装到 libexec/<vendor> ,并通过在 prefix site-packages中写入第二个 .pth 文件（命名为“ homebrew-foo-dependencies.pth”）将其添加到 sys.path 中。。

trans-unit.source: The following checklist is intended to help maintainers decide on whether to merge, request changes or close a PR. It also brings more transparency for contributors in addition to Acceptable Formulae requirements.
trans-unit.target: 以下清单旨在帮助维护人员决定是否合并，请求更改或关闭PR。除了“可接受的公式”要求之外，它还为贡献者带来了更高的透明度。

trans-unit.source: The following commands are used by Homebrew contributors to set up a fork of Homebrew’s Git repository on GitHub, create a new branch and create a GitHub pull request (“PR”) of the changes in that branch.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew贡献者使用以下命令在GitHub上建立Homebrew的Git存储库的分支，创建新分支，并创建对该分支中的更改的GitHub拉取请求（“ PR”）。

trans-unit.source: The following examples cover a number of patterns that you may encounter. These are intended to be representative samples and can be easily adapted.
trans-unit.target: 下面的例子涵盖了您可能遇到的一些模式。这些都是具有代表性的例子,可以很容易地进行调整。

trans-unit.source: The fork is so overwhelmingly popular that it surpasses the original and is now the de facto project when people think of the name.
trans-unit.target: 这款叉子的受欢迎程度非常高,以至于超过了原作,现在人们一想到这个名字,就会想到事实上的项目。

trans-unit.source: The fully-qualified name of a tapped formula: Sometimes a formula from a tapped repository may conflict with one in homebrew/core. You can still access these formulae by using a special syntax, e.g. homebrew/dupes/vim or homebrew/versions/node4.
trans-unit.target: 窃听公式的全限定名称：有时，利用窃听存储库中的公式可能与 homebrew/core 中的公式冲突。您仍然可以使用特殊语法访问这些公式，例如 homebrew/dupes/vim 或 homebrew/versions/node4 。

trans-unit.source: The governance and operation of Homebrew is determined by the PLC. The PLC will represent Homebrew in all dealings with the Software Freedom Conservancy (SFC). The PLC has final authority in all matters related to the operation of Homebrew, and will comply with all Software Freedom Conservancy policies.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的管理和运作由PLC决定。PLC将代表Homebrew与软件自由保护协会(SFC)进行所有交易。PLC拥有所有与Homebrew运营有关的最终权力,并将遵守软件自由保护协会的所有政策。

trans-unit.source: The installation prefix of a Formula
trans-unit.target: 公式的安装前缀

trans-unit.source: The installation script installs Homebrew to /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew using sudo if possible and in your home directory at ~/.linuxbrew otherwise. Homebrew does not use sudo after installation. Using /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew allows the use of more binary packages (bottles) than installing in your personal home directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话，安装脚本使用sudo将Homebrew安装到 /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew ，否则，将其安装在主目录下的 ~/.linuxbrew 。安装后，Homebrew不使用sudo。使用 /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew 允许使用比在您的个人主目录中安装更多的二进制软件包（瓶）。

trans-unit.source: The intent of this document is to help authors make decisions about clarity, style, and consistency. It is not to help settle arguments about who knows English better. Don’t use this document to be a jerk.
trans-unit.target: 本文档旨在帮助作者做出有关清晰度，样式和一致性的决定。这不是为了帮助解决关于谁更懂英语的争论。请勿将本文档当作混蛋。

trans-unit.source: The location of the Homebrew Cellar, where software is staged. This will be HOMEBREW_PREFIX/Cellar if that directory exists, or HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY/Cellar otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 放置软件的Homebrew酒窖的位置。这将是 HOMEBREW_PREFIX/Cellar 如果该目录是否存在，或者 HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY/Cellar ，否则。

trans-unit.source: The machine is not running a supported version of macOS as all bottled builds are generated only for supported macOS versions.
trans-unit.target: 该机器没有运行支持的macOS版本,因为所有的瓶装构建只为支持的macOS版本生成。

trans-unit.source: The majority of the code in Homebrew is written in Ruby which is a dynamic language. To avail the benefits of static type checking, we have set up Sorbet in our codebase which provides the benefits of static type checking to dynamic languages like Ruby.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew的大部分代码都是用Ruby写的,Ruby是一种动态语言。为了利用静态类型检查的优势,我们在代码库中设置了Sorbet,它为Ruby等动态语言提供了静态类型检查的优势。

trans-unit.source: The most common reasons for deprecation are when the upstream project is deprecated, unmaintained, or archived.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的弃用原因是上游项目被弃用、无人维护或存档。

trans-unit.source: The most common reasons for disabling a formula are:
trans-unit.target: 最常见的禁用公式的原因是:

trans-unit.source: The name of a formula: e.g. git, node, wget.
trans-unit.target: 公式的名称：例如 git ， node ， wget 。

trans-unit.source: The normal pip install --user is disabled for brewed Python. This is because of a bug in distutils, because Homebrew writes a distutils.cfg which sets the package prefix.
trans-unit.target: 普通的 pip install --user 对于酿造的Python禁用。这是由于distutils中的一个错误，因为Homebrew编写了一个 distutils.cfg 来设置包的 prefix 。

trans-unit.source: The npm registry URLs usually have the format of:
trans-unit.target: npm注册表URL的格式通常为:。

trans-unit.source: The only exception is stuff like “Apache Ant”. Apache sticks “Apache” in front of everything, but we use the formula name ant. We only include the prefix in cases like gnuplot (because it’s part of the name) and gnu-go (because everyone calls it “GNU Go”—nobody just calls it “Go”). The word “Go” is too common and there are too many implementations of it.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的例外是诸如“ Apache Ant”之类的东西。Apache将“ Apache”放在所有内容的前面，但是我们使用公式名称 ant 。我们仅在诸如 gnuplot （因为它是名称的一部分）和 gnu-go （因为每个人都将其称为“ GNU Go” —没人将其称为“ Go”）的情况下包括前缀。“ Go”一词太常见了，实现方式太多了。

trans-unit.source: The order of methods in a formula should be consistent with other formulae (e.g.: def install goes before def post_install).
trans-unit.target: 公式中方法的顺序应与其他公式一致（例如： def install 在 def post_install 之前）。

trans-unit.source: The original discontinued software recommends that fork.
trans-unit.target: 原先停用的软件建议,分叉。

trans-unit.source: The package definition
trans-unit.target: 包装定义

trans-unit.source: The preferred commit message format for simple version updates is foobar 7.3 and for fixes is foobar: fix flibble matrix..
trans-unit.target: 对于简单版本更新，首选的提交消息格式为 foobar 7.3 ，而修复程序的首选提交消息格式为 foobar: fix flibble matrix. 。

trans-unit.source: The prefix /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew was chosen so that users without admin access can ask an admin to create a linuxbrew role account and still benefit from precompiled binaries. If you do not yourself have admin privileges, consider asking your admin staff to create a linuxbrew role account for you with home directory /home/linuxbrew.
trans-unit.target: 选择了前缀 /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew ，以便没有管理员访问权限的用户可以要求管理员创建 linuxbrew 角色帐户，并且仍然可以从预编译的二进制文件中受益。如果您自己没有管理员特权，请考虑要求您的管理员为您的主目录 /home/linuxbrew 创建一个 linuxbrew 角色帐户。

trans-unit.source: The primary goal of Homebrew’s prose documents is communicating with its community of users and contributors. “Users” includes “contributors” here; wherever you see “users” you can substitute “users and contributors”.
trans-unit.target: Homebrew散文文件的主要目标是与其用户和贡献者社区进行交流。“用户”在此处包括“贡献者”；无论您在哪里看到“用户”，都可以用“用户和贡献者”代替。

trans-unit.source: The quorum to vote on resolutions and elections at a general meeting is 3 voting members or 10% of the voting members, whichever is greater.
trans-unit.target: 在股东大会上就决议和选举进行表决的法定人数为3名有表决权的成员或有表决权成员的10%,以较高者为准。

trans-unit.source: The quorum to vote on resolutions at a meeting of the PLC is a majority of its members.
trans-unit.target: 在臨立會會議上就決議案表決的法定人數為過半數成員。

trans-unit.source: The reasoning for this location is to preserve your modules between (minor) upgrades or re-installations of Python. Additionally, Homebrew has a strict policy never to write stuff outside of the brew --prefix, so we don’t spam your system.
trans-unit.target: 此位置的原因是为了在（较小）Python升级或重新安装之间保留模块。此外，Homebrew有严格的政策，切勿在 brew --prefix 之外编写内容，因此我们不会向您的系统发送垃圾邮件。

trans-unit.source: The schema itself is not currently documented outside of the code in formula.rb that generates it.
trans-unit.target: 该模式本身当前不在生成它的 formula.rb 中的代码之外。

trans-unit.source: The second level of filtering removes sensitive environment variables (such as credentials like keys, passwords or tokens) to avoid malicious subprocesses obtaining them (https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2524). This has the effect of preventing any such variables from reaching a formula’s Ruby code as they are filtered before it is called. The specific implementation can be seen in the ENV.clear_sensitive_environment! method.
trans-unit.target: 第二级过滤除去敏感的环境变量（例如密钥，密码或令牌之类的凭据），以避免恶意子进程获取它们（https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2524）。这样可以防止任何此类变量在调用公式之前就被过滤掉而无法到达公式的Ruby代码。具体的实现可以在 ENV.clear_sensitive_environment! 看到！方法。

trans-unit.source: The second level of filtering removes sensitive environment variables (such as credentials like keys, passwords or tokens) to avoid malicious subprocesses obtaining them (https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2524). This has the effect of preventing any such variables from reaching a formula’s Ruby code as they are filtered before it is called. The specific implementation can be seen in the ENV.clear_sensitive_environment! method.
trans-unit.target: 第二级过滤删除敏感的环境变量（例如凭据，如密钥，密码或令牌），以避免恶意子进程获取它们（https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2524）。这样可以防止任何此类变量在调用公式之前就被过滤掉而无法到达公式的Ruby代码。具体的实现可以在 ENV.clear_sensitive_environment! 看到！方法。

trans-unit.source: The usage string is automatically generated based on the specified number and type of named arguments (see below for more details on specifying named arguments). The generated usage string can be overridden by passing the correct usage string to the usage_banner method (placed just before the description method). See the brew tap command for an example.
trans-unit.target: 用法字符串是根据指定数量和命名参数的类型自动生成的（有关指定命名参数的更多详细信息，请参见下文）。可以通过将正确的用法字符串传递给 usage_banner 方法（放置在 description 方法之前）来覆盖生成的用法字符串。有关示例，请参见 brew tap 命令。

trans-unit.source: The variables HOMEBREW_PREFIX, HOMEBREW_CELLAR and HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY are also exported to avoid querying them multiple times. Consider adding evaluation of this command’s output to your dotfiles (e.g. ~/.profile, ~/.bash_profile, or ~/.zprofile) with: eval $(brew shellenv)
trans-unit.target: 变量 HOMEBREW_PREFIX ， HOMEBREW_CELLAR 和 HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY 也会被导出，以避免多次查询它们。考虑使用以下命令将该评估结果添加到您的点文件中（例如 ~/.profile ， ~/.bash_profile 或 ~/.zprofile ）： eval $(brew shellenv)

trans-unit.source: There are a few ideas to fix this problem:
trans-unit.target: 有几个想法可以解决这个问题。

trans-unit.source: There are many reasons why formulae may be deprecated, disabled, or removed. This document explains the differences between each method as well as explaining when one method should be used over another.
trans-unit.target: 公式可能被废弃、禁用或删除的原因有很多。本文档解释了每种方法之间的差异,并解释了何时应该使用一种方法而不是另一种方法。

trans-unit.source: There are plenty of others; check /usr/lib for them.
trans-unit.target: 还有很多其他的。检查 /usr/lib 。

trans-unit.source: There are subtle incompatibilities between several of the C++ standard libraries, so Homebrew will refuse to install software if a dependency was built with an incompatible C++ library. It’s recommended that you install the dependency tree using a compatible compiler.
trans-unit.target: 几个C ++标准库之间存在细微的不兼容性，因此，如果使用不兼容的C ++库构建依赖关系，Homebrew将拒绝安装软件。建议您使用兼容的编译器安装依赖项树。

trans-unit.source: There are times when we may wish to migrate a formula from one tap into another tap. To do this:
trans-unit.target: 有时,我们可能希望将一个公式从一个水龙头迁移到另一个水龙头。要做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: There are two C++ standard libraries supported by Apple compilers.

If you think Homebrew’s perspective is annoying on this: try and see how Debian responds to requests to ship your binaries.

trans-unit.source: Tons of build scripts break if their dependencies aren’t in either /usr or /usr/local. We fix this for Homebrew formulae (although we don’t always test for it), but you’ll find that many RubyGems and Python setup scripts break which is something outside our control.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们的依赖项不在 /usr 或 /usr/local 中,则大量构建脚本会中断。我们为Homebrew公式修复了此问题（尽管我们并不总是对其进行测试），但是您会发现许多RubyGems和Python安装脚本都中断了，这是我们无法控制的。

trans-unit.source: Try to extract the installed software’s version and compare it to the cask, deciding what to do at that time. That’s a complicated solution that breaks other parts of our methodology, such as using versions to interpolate in urls (a definite win for maintainability). That solution also isn’t universal, as many software developers are inconsistent in their versioning schemes (and app bundles are meant to have two version strings) and it doesn’t work for all types of software we support.
trans-unit.target: 尝试提取已安装软件的版本并将其与容器进行比较，从而决定当时的操作。这是一个复杂的解决方案，破坏了我们方法论的其他部分，例如使用版本对 url 进行插值（这是维护性的绝对胜利）。该解决方案也不是通用的，因为许多软件开发人员的版本控制方案不一致（并且应用程序捆绑有两个版本字符串），并且不适用于我们支持的所有类型的软件。

trans-unit.source: Try to install the formula using brew install --build-from-source <formula>, where <formula> is the name of your formula. If any errors occur, correct your formula and attempt to install it again. The formula should install without errors by the end of this step.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用 brew install --build-from-source <formula> 来安装公式，其中<formula>是公式的名称。如果发生任何错误，请更正您的公式并尝试再次安装它。在此步骤结束之前，该公式应安装无误。

trans-unit.source: Try to prevent the software’s automated updates. That won’t be a universal solution and may cause it to break. Most software on Homebrew Cask is closed-source, so we’d be guessing. This is also why pinning casks to a version isn’t available.
trans-unit.target: 尝试阻止软件的自动更新。那将不是一个通用的解决方案，并可能导致它崩溃。Homebrew Cask上的大多数软件都是封闭源代码，因此我们会猜测。这也是为什么无法将木桶固定到某个版本的原因。

trans-unit.source: Try to summarise from the homepage what the formula does in the description. Note that the description is automatically prepended with the formula name.
trans-unit.target: 尝试从 homepage 上总结该公式在 desc 。请注意， desc 会自动以公式名称开头。

trans-unit.source: Try to summarize from the homepage what the formula does in the description. Note that the description is automatically prepended with the formula name.

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, in the world of software there are bad actors that bundle malware with their apps. Even so, Homebrew Cask has long decided it will not be an active gatekeeper (macOS already has one) and users are expected to know about the software they are installing. This means we will not always remove casks that link to these apps, in part because there is no clear line between useful app, potentially unwanted program, and the different shades of malware — what is useful to one user may be seen as malicious by another.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，在软件世界中，有不良行为者将恶意软件与他们的应用捆绑在一起。即便如此，Homebrew Cask长期以来一直决定不再是活跃的网守（macOS已经拥有一个），希望用户了解他们正在安装的软件。这意味着我们不会总是删除链接到这些应用程序的容器，部分原因是有用的应用程序，可能有害的程序以及不同类型的恶意软件之间没有清晰的界线-对一个用户有用的东西可能会被另一个用户视为恶意软件。

trans-unit.source: Upstream should have a release branch for each formula version, and release security updates for each version when necessary. For example, PHP 7.0 was not a supported version but PHP 7.2 was in January 2020. By contrast, most software projects are structured to only release security updates for their latest versions, so their earlier versions are not eligible for versioning.
trans-unit.target: 上游应该为每个公式版本都有一个发布分支，并在必要时为每个版本发布安全更新。例如，PHP 7.0不是受支持的版本，而PHP 7.2是在2020年1月。相比之下，大多数软件项目在结构上仅发布其最新版本的安全更新，因此其较早版本不适合进行版本控制。

trans-unit.source: Upstream should have a release branch for the versioned formulae version and still make security updates for that version, when necessary. For example, PHP 5.5 was not a supported version but PHP 7.2 was in January 2018.
trans-unit.target: 上游应具有版本化公式版本的发行分支，并在必要时仍对该版本进行安全更新。例如，不支持PHP 5.5，但PHP 7.2于2018年1月发布。

trans-unit.source: Use :all_of to indicate that the user must comply with multiple licenses:

trans-unit.source: Use :any_of to indicate that the user can choose which license applies:

trans-unit.source: Use :any_of, :all_of or :with to describe complex license expressions. :any_of should be used when the user can choose which license to use. :all_of should be used when the user must use all licenses. :with should be used to specify a valid SPDX exception. Add + to an identifier to indicate that the formulae can be licensed under later versions of the same license.
trans-unit.target: 使用 :any_of ， :all_of 或 :with 描述复杂的许可证表达。当用户可以选择要使用的许可证时，应使用 :any_of 。当用户必须使用所有许可证时，应使用 :all_of 。 :with 应该用于指定有效的SPDX异常。在标识符上添加 + 表示可以在同一许可证的更高版本下许可这些公式。

trans-unit.source: Use this password for authentication with the GitHub API, for features such as brew search. This is deprecated in favour of using HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN.

trans-unit.source: Use this path as the temporary directory for building packages. Changing this may be needed if your system temporary directory and Homebrew prefix are on different volumes, as macOS has trouble moving symlinks across volumes when the target does not yet exist. This issue typically occurs when using FileVault or custom SSD configurations.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个路径作为构建软件包的临时目录。如果你的系统临时目录和Homebrew前缀在不同的卷上,可能需要更改这个目录,因为当目标还不存在时,macOS在跨卷移动符号链接时有问题。这个问题通常发生在使用FileVault或自定义SSD配置时。

trans-unit.source: Use this personal access token for the GitHub API, for features such as brew search. You can create one at https://github.com/settings/tokens. If set, GitHub will allow you a greater number of API requests. For more information, see: https://docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#rate-limiting
trans-unit.target: 将此个人访问令牌用于GitHub API，以实现诸如 brew search 之类的功能。您可以在https://github.com/settings/tokens上创建一个。如果设置，则GitHub将允许您更多的API请求。有关更多信息，请参见：https : //docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#rate-limiting

trans-unit.source: Use this username for authentication with the GitHub API, for features such as brew search. This is deprecated in favour of using HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN.
trans-unit.target: 使用此用户名通过GitHub API进行身份验证，以实现诸如 brew search 之类的功能。不建议使用 HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN 。

trans-unit.source: Users can then install your formulae either with brew install foo if there’s no core formula with the same name, or with brew install user/repo/foo to avoid conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 然后，如果没有相同名称的核心公式，用户可以使用 brew install foo 安装您的公式，或者使用 brew install user/repo/foo 来避免冲突。

trans-unit.source: Users take precedence over maintainers, except in specifically maintainer-focused documents.
trans-unit.target: 用户优先于维护者,除非是专门针对维护者的文档。

trans-unit.source: Using T.reveal_type. In files which are true or higher, if we wrap a variable or method call in T.reveal_type, Sorbet will show us what type it thinks that variable has in the output of srb tc. This is particularly useful when writing method signatures and debugging. Make sure to remove this line from your code before committing your changes, since this is just a debugging tool.
trans-unit.target: 使用 T.reveal_type 。在 true 或更高的文件中，如果我们将变量或方法调用包装在 T.reveal_type 中，Sorbet将向我们展示srb srb tc 输出中该变量具有什么类型。这在编写方法签名和调试时特别有用。提交更改之前，请确保从代码中删除此行，因为这只是调试工具。

trans-unit.source: Using the JSON output, queries can be made against Homebrew with less risk of being broken due to Homebrew code changes, and without needing to understand Homebrew’s Ruby internals.
trans-unit.target: 使用JSON输出，可以针对Homebrew进行查询，从而减少了因Homebrew代码更改而被破坏的风险，并且无需了解Homebrew的Ruby内部结构。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae in homebrew/core
trans-unit.target: homebrew/core 版本化公式

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should be as similar as possible and sensible compared to the main formulae. Creating or updating a versioned formula should be a chance to ask questions of the main formula and vice versa, e.g. can some unused or useless options be removed or made default?
trans-unit.target: 版本化公式与主公式相比,应尽可能地相似和合理。创建或更新版本公式应该是向主公式提出问题的机会,反之亦然,例如,是否可以删除一些未使用或无用的选项或将其变成默认选项?

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should be as similar as possible and sensible compared to the non-versioned formulae. Creating or updating a versioned formula should be a chance to ask questions of the non-versioned formula, e.g. can some unused or useless options be removed or made default?
trans-unit.target: 版本化公式与未版本化公式相比,应尽可能地相似和合理。创建或更新版本化公式应该是对非版本化公式提出问题的机会,例如,是否可以删除一些未使用或无用的选项或将其变成默认选项?

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should differ in major/minor (not patch) versions from the current stable release. This is because patch versions indicate bug or security updates and we want to ensure you apply security updates.
trans-unit.target: 版本化的公式应该与当前稳定版本的主要/次要(不是补丁)版本不同。这是因为补丁版本表示错误或安全更新,我们要确保您应用安全更新。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should differ in major/minor (not patch) versions from the current stable release. This is because patch versions indicate bug or security updates, and we want to ensure you apply security updates.
trans-unit.target: 版本化的公式应该与当前稳定版本的主要/次要(不是补丁)版本不同。这是因为补丁版本表示错误或安全更新,我们要确保你应用安全更新。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should not have resources that require security updates. For example, a node@6 formula should not have an npm resource but instead rely on the npm provided by the upstream tarball.
trans-unit.target: 版本化公式不应包含需要安全更新的 resource 。例如， node@6 公式不应具有 npm 资源，而应依赖于上游tarball提供的 npm 。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should only be linkable at the same time as their non-versioned counterpart if the upstream project provides support for it, e.g. using suffixed binaries. If this is not possible, use keg_only :versioned_formula to allow users to have multiple versions installed at once.
trans-unit.target: 如果上游项目提供了支持，例如，使用带后缀的二进制文件，则版本化公式只能与非版本化公式同时链接。如果这不可能，请使用 keg_only :versioned_formula 允许用户一次安装多个版本。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should share a codebase with the main formula. If the project is split into a different repository, we recommend creating a new formula (formula2 rather than formula@2 or formula@1).
trans-unit.target: 版本化的公式应与主公式共享一个代码库。如果将项目拆分到其他存储库中，我们建议创建一个新公式（ formula2 而不是Formula formula@2 或Formula formula@1 ）。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae submitted should be expected to be used by a large number of people. If this ceases to be the case, they will be removed. We will aim not to remove those in the top 3,000 install_on_request formulae.
trans-unit.target: 应当期望提交的版本化公式可以被许多人使用。如果情况不再如此，则将其删除。我们的目标是不要删除前3,000个 install_on_request 公式中的那些。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae submitted should be expected to be used by a large number of people. If this ceases to be the case: they will be removed. We will aim not to remove those in the top 3,000 install_on_request formulae.
trans-unit.target: 应该期望提交的版本化公式可以被大量人使用。如果情况不再如此：它们将被删除。我们的目标是不要删除前3,000个 install_on_request 公式中的那些。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae we include in homebrew/core must meet the following standards:
trans-unit.target: 我们在自制软件/内核中包含的版本化公式必须满足以下标准：

trans-unit.source: Versioned software should build on all Homebrew’s supported versions of macOS.
trans-unit.target: 版本软件应基于Homebrew支持的所有macOS版本构建。

trans-unit.source: Versions
trans-unit.target: Versions

trans-unit.source: Vim
trans-unit.target: Vim

trans-unit.source: Virtualenv
trans-unit.target: Virtualenv

trans-unit.source: Virtualenv has a --system-site-packages switch to allow “global” (i.e. Homebrew’s) site-packages to be accessible from within the virtualenv.
trans-unit.target: Virtualenv具有 --system-site-packages 开关，以允许从virtualenv内部访问“全局”（即Homebrew） site-packages 。

trans-unit.source: We aim to bottle everything.
trans-unit.target: 我们的目标是把一切都装进瓶子里。

trans-unit.source: We appreciate your help in keeping Homebrew’s formulae up to date as new versions of software are released!
trans-unit.target: 感谢您在新版本软件发布时使Homebrew公式保持最新的帮助！

trans-unit.source: We are also open to removing casks where we feel there is enough evidence that the app is malicious. To suggest a cask for removal, submit a Pull Request to delete it, together with your reasoning. Typically, this will mean presenting a VirusTotal scan of the app showing it is malicious, ideally with some other reporting indicating it’s not a false positive.
trans-unit.target: 如果有足够的证据表明该应用程序是恶意的，我们也愿意删除木桶。要提出要删除的酒桶的建议，请提交“拉取请求”以将其删除，并提供您的理由。通常，这意味着要对应用程序进行VirusTotal扫描，以表明它是恶意软件，理想情况下，还有一些其他报告表明它不是假阳性。

trans-unit.source: We are not willing to remove software packaged in Homebrew/homebrew-core in favour of an upstream tap. We are not willing to instruct users in our formulae to use your formulae instead. If upstream projects have issues with how Homebrew packages your software: please file issues (or, ideally, pull requests) to address these problems.
trans-unit.target: 我们不愿意删除Homebrew/homebrew-core中打包的软件,而采用上游的tap。我们也不愿意在我们的公式中指示用户使用你们的公式。如果上游项目对Homebrew打包软件的方式有问题:请提交问题(或者,最好是拉请求)来解决这些问题。

trans-unit.source: We do not accept these casks since they offer a higher-than-normal security risk.
trans-unit.target: 我们不接受这些木桶,因为它们具有高于正常的安全风险。

trans-unit.source: We do not defer to extensive nonstandard capitalisation, typesetting, or other styling of brand names, aside from the normal capitalisation of proper nouns and simple internal capitalisation
trans-unit.target: 除了专有名词的正常大写和简单的内部大写外,我们不会对品牌名称进行大量的非标准大写、排版或其他样式的处理。

trans-unit.source: We don’t accept software without a tagged version because they regularly break due to upstream changes and we can’t provide bottles for them.
trans-unit.target: 我们不接受没有标签版本的软件，因为它们会由于上游更改而定期中断，因此我们无法为其提供包装。

trans-unit.source: We don’t like binary formulae
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢二进制公式

trans-unit.source: We don’t like install scripts that are pulling from the master branch of Git repositories or unversioned, unchecksummed tarballs. These should use resource blocks with specific revisions or checksummed tarballs instead. Note that we now allow tools like cargo, gem and pip to download specifically versioned libraries during installation.
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢从Git存储库的 master 分支中提取的安装脚本或未版本化，未经校验的tarball。这些应该使用具有特定修订版的 resource 块或校验和的tarball。请注意，我们现在允许在安装过程中使用 cargo ， gem 和 pip 之类的工具来下载特定版本的库。

trans-unit.source: We don’t like install scripts that download unversioned things
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢下载未版本化内容的安装脚本

trans-unit.source: We don’t like tools that upgrade themselves
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢自行升级的工具

trans-unit.source: We frown on authors submitting their own work unless it is very popular.
trans-unit.target: 我们不赞成作者提交自己的作品,除非它非常受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: We generally try not to duplicate system libraries and complicated tools in core Homebrew but we do duplicate some commonly used tools.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,我们在核心Homebrew中尽量不重复系统库和复杂的工具,但我们确实重复了一些常用的工具。

trans-unit.source: We have strong reasons to believe including the Cask can put the whole project at risk. Happened only once so far, with Popcorn Time.
trans-unit.target: 我们有充分的理由相信包括酒桶在内的整个项目都可能会面临风险。到目前为止，与《爆米花时间》只发生过一次。

trans-unit.source: We maintain separate Taps for different types of binaries. Our nomenclature is:
trans-unit.target: 我们为不同类型的二进制文件维护了单独的Tap。我们的命名法是:

trans-unit.source: We may temporarily add versioned formulae for our own needs that do not meet these standards in homebrew/core. The presence of a versioned formula there does not imply it will be maintained indefinitely or that we are willing to accept any more versions that do not meet the requirements above.
trans-unit.target: 我们可能会为满足自己的需要临时添加版本化公式，这些公式不符合Homebrew / core中的这些标准。此处存在版本化公式并不意味着将无限期维护该公式，或者我们愿意接受任何其他不满足上述要求的版本。

trans-unit.source: We now accept stuff that comes with macOS as long as it uses keg_only :provided_by_macos to be keg-only by default.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们接受macOS随附的东西，只要它使用 keg_only :provided_by_macos 默认为仅桶装即可。

trans-unit.source: We now accept versioned formulae as long as they meet the requirements.
trans-unit.target: 现在，只要符合要求，我们就可以接受版本化公式。

trans-unit.source: We only accept formulae that use a Debian Free Software Guidelines license or are released into the public domain following DFSG Guidelines on Public Domain software.
trans-unit.target: 我们仅接受使用Debian自由软件准则许可证或根据DFSG公共领域软件准则发布到公共领域的公式。

trans-unit.source: We prefer:
trans-unit.target: 我们倾向于:

trans-unit.source: We removed SHA1 support in November 2016, 21 months after we started warning people to move away from it for verification. This is enforced in the same way MD5 is, by blocking the installation of that individual formula until the checksum is migrated.
trans-unit.target: 在我们开始警告人们不要使用SHA1进行验证之后的21个月，我们于2016年11月取消了SHA1支持。通过阻止安装单个公式，直到迁移校验和，都以与MD5相同的方式实施。

trans-unit.source: We respect all people’s choice of personal pronouns
trans-unit.target: 我们尊重所有人对人称代词的选择

trans-unit.source: We set up distutils such that pip install will always put modules in $(brew --prefix)/lib/pythonX.Y/site-packages and scripts in $(brew --prefix)/share/python. Therefore, you won’t need sudo!
trans-unit.target: 我们将distutils设置为 pip install 始终将模块放在 $(brew --prefix)/lib/pythonX.Y/site-packages 中,并将脚本放在 $(brew --prefix)/share/python 中。因此，您不需要sudo！

trans-unit.source: We sometimes make this more explicit to exclude unwanted matches. URLs with a preceding path can use href=.*?/ and others can use href=["']?. For example, this is necessary when the page also contains unwanted files with a longer prefix (another-example-1.2.tar.gz).
trans-unit.target: 有时，我们会更明确地排除不必要的匹配项。带有前一个路径的URL可以使用 href=.*?/ ，其他的URL可以使用 href=["']? 例如，当页面中还包含不需要的文件且前缀较长时，则这是必需的（ another-example-1.2.tar.gz ）。

trans-unit.source: We strive for “correct” but not “fancy” usage. Think newspaper article, not academic paper.
trans-unit.target: 我们力求“正确”使用，而不是“花哨”使用。想想报纸上的文章，而不是学术论文。

trans-unit.source: We use the macOS sandbox to stop this but this doesn’t work when run as the root user (which also has read and write access to almost everything on the system).
trans-unit.target: 我们使用macOS沙箱来阻止此操作，但是以 root 用户身份运行时，此操作将无效（root用户也具有对系统上几乎所有内容的读写访问权限）。

trans-unit.source: We want tests that don’t require any user input and test the basic functionality of the application. For example foo build-foo input.foo is a good test and (despite their widespread use) foo --version and foo --help are bad tests. However, a bad test is better than no test at all.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望不需要任何用户输入的测试，并测试应用程序的基本功能。例如， foo build-foo input.foo 是一个很好的测试，并且（尽管广泛使用） foo --version 和 foo --help 是不好的测试。但是，糟糕的测试总比没有好。

trans-unit.source: We will reject formulae that seem too obscure, partly because they won’t get maintained and partly because we have to draw the line somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 我们将拒绝看起来过于晦涩的公式，部分是因为它们无法得到维护，部分是因为我们不得不在某些地方划清界限。

trans-unit.source: We’re a package manager so we want to do things like resolve dependencies and set up applications for our users. If things require too much manual intervention then they aren’t useful in a package manager.
trans-unit.target: 我们是一个程序包管理器，因此我们想做一些事情，例如解决依赖关系并为我们的用户设置应用程序。如果事情需要太多的手动干预，那么它们在包管理器中就没有用了。

trans-unit.source: Well done, you are now a Homebrew contributor!
trans-unit.target: 做得很好,你现在是家酿贡献者了。

trans-unit.source: What both methods have in common is that they are setting the correct environment for using npm inside Homebrew and are returning the arguments for invoking npm install for their specific use cases. This includes fixing an important edge case with the npm cache (caused by Homebrew’s redirection of HOME during the build and test process) by using our own custom npm_cache inside HOMEBREW_CACHE, which would otherwise result in very long build times and high disk space usage.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法的共同点在于，它们为在Homebrew中使用npm设置了正确的环境，并返回了针对特定用例调用 npm install 的参数。这包括通过在 npm_cache 内使用我们自己的自定义npm_cache来 HOMEBREW_CACHE npm缓存（由Homebrew 在构建和测试过程中对 HOME 进行重定向导致的）的一个重要问题，否则将导致非常长的构建时间和高磁盘空间使用率。

trans-unit.source: What does “keg-only” mean?
trans-unit.target: “仅生猪”是什么意思？

trans-unit.source: What is --single-version-externally-managed?
trans-unit.target: 什么是 --single-version-externally-managed ？

trans-unit.source: What?
trans-unit.target: What?

trans-unit.source: When patching (i.e. fixing header file inclusion, fixing compiler warnings, etc.) the first thing to do is check whether or not the upstream project is aware of the issue. If not, file a bug report and/or submit your patch for inclusion. We may sometimes still accept your patch before it was submitted upstream but by getting the ball rolling on fixing the upstream issue you reduce the length of time we have to carry the patch around.
trans-unit.target: 当 patch 荷兰国际集团（即固定头文件包含，修复编译器警告等）做的第一件事就是检查上游项目是否是意识到这个问题。如果不是，请提交错误报告和/或提交补丁以包含在内。有时我们可能仍会在上游提交补丁之前接受您的补丁，但是通过解决上游问题，您可以缩短我们随身携带补丁的时间。

trans-unit.source: When brew livecheck is unable to identify versions for a formula, we can control its behavior using a livecheck block. Here is a simple example to check a page for links containing a filename like example-1.2.tar.gz:
trans-unit.target: 当 brew livecheck 无法识别公式的版本时，我们可以使用 livecheck 块来控制其行为。这是一个简单的示例，用于检查页面中包含诸如 example-1.2.tar.gz 之类的文件名的链接：

trans-unit.source: When Homebrew already has a formula called foo we typically do not accept requests to replace that formula with something else also named foo. This is to avoid both confusing and surprising users’ expectations.
trans-unit.target: 当Homebrew已经有一个名为 foo 的公式时，我们通常不接受将其替换为其他也称为 foo 的请求。这是为了避免混淆和令人惊讶的用户期望。

trans-unit.source: When a dependent of a formula fails against a new version of that dependency it must receive a revision. An example of such failure can be seen here and the fix here.
trans-unit.target: 当公式的依赖项无法针对该依赖项的新版本失败时，必须对其进行 revision 。这种失败的例子可以看出这里和修复这里。

trans-unit.source: When a formula is deprecated or disabled, a reason explaining the action must be provided.
trans-unit.target: 当一个公式被废弃或禁用时,必须提供一个解释该行动的理由。

trans-unit.source: When a new Xcode release is made, the following things need to be updated:

trans-unit.target: 缩写时,在任何文件中都要用第一个用法来介绍缩写。

trans-unit.source: When an App exists in more than one language or has different regional editions, the language stanza should be used to switch between languages or regions.
trans-unit.target: 当一个应用程序存在于一种以上的语言或有不同的地方版本，在 language 节应采用语言或地区之间进行切换。

trans-unit.source: When an App has a main stable version, alternative versions should be submitted to Homebrew/homebrew-cask-versions.
trans-unit.target: 当应用具有主要的稳定版本时，应将其他版本提交给Homebrew / homebrew-cask-versions。

trans-unit.source: When an App is only available as beta, development, or unstable versions, or in cases where such a version is the general standard, then said version can go into the main repo.
trans-unit.target: 当一个App只有测试版、开发版或不稳定版时,或者在这样的版本是通用标准的情况下,那么上述版本可以进入主仓库。

trans-unit.source: When automatic brew cleanup is disabled, if you uninstall a formula, it will only remove the latest version you have installed. It will not remove all versions of the formula that you may have installed in the past. Homebrew will continue to attempt to install the newest version it knows about when you run brew upgrade. This can be surprising.
trans-unit.target: 禁用自动 brew cleanup ，如果您卸载公式，它将仅删除您已安装的最新版本。它不会删除您过去安装的公式的所有版本。当您运行 brew upgrade 时，Homebrew将继续尝试安装它知道的最新版本。这可能令人惊讶。

trans-unit.source: When matching the version from a file name on an HTML page, we often restrict matching to href attributes. href=.*? will match the opening delimiter (", ') as well as any part of the URL before the file name.
trans-unit.target: 当从HTML页面上的文件名匹配版本时，我们通常将匹配限制为 href 属性。 href=.*? 将与开头分隔符（ " ， ' ）以及文件名之前URL的任何部分匹配。

trans-unit.source: When necessary, a strategy block allows us to have greater flexibility in how upstream version information is matched and processed. Currently, they’re only used when the upstream version format needs to be manipulated to match the formula/cask format. In the example above, we’re converting a date format like 2020-01-01 into 20200101.
trans-unit.target: 必要时， strategy 块可让我们在上游版本信息的匹配和处理方式上具有更大的灵活性。当前，仅在需要对上游版本格式进行操作以使其与公式/木桶格式匹配时才使用它们。在上面的示例中，我们将类似 2020-01-01 的日期格式转换为 20200101 。

trans-unit.source: When run without any arguments, brew typecheck, will run considering the strictness levels set in each of the individual Ruby files in the core Homebrew codebase. However, when it is run on a specific file or directory, more errors may show up since Sorbet cannot resolve constants defined outside the scope of the specified file. These problems can be solved with RBI files. Currently brew typecheck provides --quiet, --file, --dir and --ignore options but you can explore more options with srb tc --help and passing them with srb tc.
trans-unit.target: 当不带任何参数的情况下运行时， brew typecheck 将考虑在Homebrew核心代码库中每个单独的Ruby文件中设置的严格性级别下运行。但是，当它在特定文件或目录上运行时，可能会出现更多错误，因为Sorbet无法解析在指定文件范围之外定义的常量。这些问题可以通过RBI文件解决。目前， brew typecheck 提供 --quiet ， --file ， --dir 和 --ignore 选项，但你可以探索更多的选择 srb tc --help 并通过它们与 srb tc 。

trans-unit.source: When run without any arguments, brew typecheck, will run considering the strictness levels set in each of the individual Ruby files in the core Homebrew codebase. However, when typecheck is run on a specific file or directory, more errors may show up since Sorbet cannot resolve constants defined outside the scope of the specified file. These problems can be solved with RBI files. Currently brew typecheck provides --quiet, --file, --dir and --ignore options but you can explore more options with srb tc --help and passing them with srb tc.
trans-unit.target: 当不带任何参数运行时， brew typecheck 将考虑在Homebrew核心代码库中的每个单独Ruby文件中设置的严格性级别来运行。但是，当在特定文件或目录上运行typecheck时，可能会出现更多错误，因为Sorbet无法解析在指定文件范围之外定义的常量。这些问题可以通过RBI文件解决。目前， brew typecheck 提供 --quiet ， --file ， --dir 和 --ignore 选项，但你可以探索更多的选择 srb tc --help 并通过它们与 srb tc 。

trans-unit.source: With URL specified, tap a formula repository from anywhere, using any transport protocol that git(1) handles. The one-argument form of tap simplifies but also limits. This two-argument command makes no assumptions, so taps can be cloned from places other than GitHub and using protocols other than HTTPS, e.g. SSH, git, HTTP, FTP(S), rsync.
trans-unit.target: 在指定了 URL 的情况下，使用 git （1）处理的任何传输协议从任何地方点击公式存储库。一键式 tap 简化但也限制了。这个由两个参数组成的命令不做任何假设，因此可以从GitHub以外的地方克隆出水龙头，并使用HTTPS以外的协议（例如SSH，git，HTTP，FTP（S），rsync）来克隆水龙头。

trans-unit.source: With URL specified, taps a formula repository from anywhere, using any transport protocol that git handles. The one-argument form of tap simplifies but also limits. This two-argument command makes no assumptions, so taps can be cloned from places other than GitHub and using protocols other than HTTPS, e.g., SSH, GIT, HTTP, FTP(S), RSYNC.
trans-unit.target: 在指定了 URL 的情况下，可以使用 git 处理的任何传输协议从任何地方点击公式存储库。一键式 tap 简化但也限制了。这个由两个参数组成的命令不做任何假设，因此可以从GitHub以外的地方克隆水龙头，并使用HTTPS以外的协议（例如SSH，GIT，HTTP，FTP（S），RSYNC）进行克隆。

trans-unit.target: 在未指定 URL 的情况下，使用HTTPS在GitHub上点击公式存储库。由于GitHub上托管了许多水龙头，因此该命令是 brew tap user / repo https://github.com/ user /homebrew- repo 的快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: Yes! It’s easy! Just brew create URL. Homebrew will then open the formula in EDITOR so you can edit it, but it probably already installs; try it: brew install <formula>. If you encounter any issues, run the command with the --debug switch like so: brew install --debug <formula>, which drops you into a debugging shell.

trans-unit.source: Yes! It’s easy! Just brew edit <formula>. You don’t have to submit modifications back to homebrew/core, just edit the formula as you personally need it and brew install <formula>. As a bonus brew update will merge your changes with upstream so you can still keep the formula up-to-date with your personal modifications!
trans-unit.target: 是的！这简单！只需 brew edit <formula> 。您不必将修改提交回 homebrew/core ，只需根据个人需要编辑公式，然后执行 brew install <formula> 即可。作为额外的 brew update 将您的更改与上游合并，因此您仍然可以通过个人修改使公式保持最新！

trans-unit.source: You can run brew audit --strict --online to test formulae for adherence to Homebrew house style. The audit command includes warnings for trailing whitespace, preferred URLs for certain source hosts, and a lot of other style issues. Fixing these warnings before committing will make the process a lot quicker for everyone.
trans-unit.target: 您可以运行 brew audit --strict --online 以测试公式是否符合Homebrew房屋风格。所述 audit 命令包括用于尾随空白警告，对于某些源主机优选的网址，和很多其他的风格的问题。在提交之前修复这些警告将使每个人的过程更快。

trans-unit.source: You can set environment variables in a formula’s install method using ENV["VARIABLE_NAME"] = "VALUE". An example can be seen in the gh formula.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ENV["VARIABLE_NAME"] = "VALUE" 在公式的 install 方法中设置环境变量。一个例子中可以看到的 gh 式。

trans-unit.source: You can set environment variables in a formula’s install method using ENV["VARIABLE_NAME"] = "VALUE". An example can be seen in the gh formula. Environment variables can also be set temporarily using the with_env method; any variables defined in the call to that method will be restored to their original values at the end of the block. An example can be seen in the csound formula.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ENV["VARIABLE_NAME"] = "VALUE" 在公式的 install 方法中设置环境变量。一个例子中可以看到的 gh 式。也可以使用 with_env 方法临时设置环境变量。在该方法的调用中定义的任何变量都将在该块的末尾恢复到其原始值。一个例子中可以看到的 csound 公式。

trans-unit.source: You can skip the installation of dependencies by adding space-separated values to one or more of the following environment variables: HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_BREW_SKIP, HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_CASK_SKIP, HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_MAS_SKIP, HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_WHALEBREW_SKIP, HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_TAP_SKIP.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过在以下一个或多个环境变量中添加以空格分隔的值来跳过依赖项的安装： HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_BREW_SKIP ， HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_CASK_SKIP ， HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_MAS_SKIP ， HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_WHALEBREW_SKIP ， HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_TAP_SKIP 。

trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 --file 或通过设置 HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_FILE 环境变量来指定 Brewfile 位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use homebrew-pypi-poet to help you write resource stanzas. To use it, set up a virtualenv and install your package and all its dependencies. trans-unit.source: You can use brew update-python-resources to help you write resource stanzas. To use it, simply run brew update-python-resources <formula>. Sometimes, brew update-python-resources won’t be able to automatically update the resources. If this happens, try running brew update-python-resources --print-only <formula> to print the resource stanzas instead of applying the changes directly to the file. You can then copy and paste resources as needed.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 brew update-python-resources 帮助您编写资源节。要使用它，只需运行 brew update-python-resources <formula> 即可。有时候， brew update-python-resources 将无法自动更新资源。如果发生这种情况，请尝试运行 brew update-python-resources --print-only <formula> 来打印资源节，而不是将更改直接应用于文件。然后，您可以根据需要复制和粘贴资源。

trans-unit.source: You can use the file utilities provided by Ruby’s FileUtils. These are included in the Formula class, so you do not need the FileUtils. prefix to use them.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用Ruby的 FileUtils 提供的文件实用程序。这些包含在 Formula 类中，因此您不需要 FileUtils. 使用它们的前缀。

trans-unit.source: You must configure your shell to enable its completion support. This is because the Homebrew-managed completions are stored under HOMEBREW_PREFIX which your system shell may not be aware of, and since it is difficult to automatically configure bash and zsh completions in a robust manner, the Homebrew installer does not do it for you.
trans-unit.target: 您必须配置外壳以启用其完成支持。这是因为Homebrew管理的 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 存储在系统外壳可能不知道的HOMEBREW_PREFIX下，并且由于很难以健壮的方式自动配置 bash 和 zsh 补全，因此Homebrew安装程序不会为您执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: You must then configure your shell to enable its completion support. This is because the Homebrew-managed completions are stored under HOMEBREW_PREFIX which your system shell may not be aware of, and since it is difficult to automatically configure bash and zsh completions in a robust manner, the Homebrew installer does not do it for you.
trans-unit.target: 然后，您必须配置外壳以启用其完成支持。这是因为Homebrew管理的 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 存储在系统外壳可能不知道的HOMEBREW_PREFIX下，并且由于很难以可靠的方式自动配置 bash 和 zsh 补全，因此Homebrew安装程序不会为您完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: You need sudo to install to these like so: sudo gem install, sudo easy_install or sudo cpan -i.
trans-unit.target: 你需要 sudo 来安装这些像这样： sudo gem install ， sudo easy_install 或 sudo cpan -i 。

trans-unit.source: You need to have the Xcode Command Line Utilities installed (and updated): run xcode-select --install in the terminal.
trans-unit.target: 您需要安装（并更新）Xcode命令行实用程序：在终端中运行 xcode-select --install 。

trans-unit.source: You should also be able to present clear actionable fixes to those concerns. Simply asking for it without solutions will get your issue closed.
trans-unit.target: 你还应该能够针对这些问题提出明确的可操作的修复方案。仅仅提出要求而不提出解决方案,会让你的问题不了了之。

trans-unit.source: You should only ever sudo a tool you trust. Of course, you can trust Homebrew 😉 But do you trust the multi-megabyte Makefile that Homebrew runs? Developers often understand C++ far better than they understand make syntax. It’s too high a risk to sudo such stuff. It could modify (or upload) any files on your system. And indeed, we’ve seen some build scripts try to modify /usr even when the prefix was specified as something else entirely.
trans-unit.target: 您只应该使用您信任的工具。当然，您可以信任Homebrew😉但是您是否信任Homebrew运行的数兆字节的Makefile？开发人员通常对C ++的理解远胜于对make语法的理解。sudo这样的东西的风险太大。它可以修改（或上传）系统上的任何文件。确实，我们已经看到一些构建脚本试图修改 /usr ,即使将前缀完全指定为其他名称。

trans-unit.source: You will now have to work to develop the boilerplate code from brew create into a fully-fledged formula. Your main references will be the Formula Cookbook, similar formulae in Homebrew, and the upstream documentation for your chosen software. Be sure to also take note of the Homebrew documentation for writing Python and Node formulae, if applicable.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您将需要进行工作，以将来自 brew create 的样板代码开发为完整的公式。您的主要参考资料将是Formula Cookbook，Homebrew中的类似公式以及所选软件的上游文档。如果适用，请确保还注意用于编写 Python 和 Node 公式的Homebrew文档。

trans-unit.target: 您会在某些公式中看到类似的内容。这会将文件 foo 移动到公式的 bin 目录（ /usr/local/Cellar/pkg/0.1/bin ）中并使其可执行（ chmod 0555 foo ）。

trans-unit.source: You’re done! Try installing a package:
trans-unit.target: 你完成了！尝试安装软件包：

trans-unit.source: You’re finally ready to submit your formula to the homebrew-core or linuxbrew-core repository. If you haven’t done this before, you can refer to the How to Open a Pull Request documentation for help. Maintainers will review the pull request and provide feedback about any areas that need to be addressed before the formula can be added to Homebrew.
trans-unit.target: 您终于可以将公式提交到homebrew-core或linuxbrew-core存储库。如果您以前没有做过此操作，则可以参考“如何打开请求请求”文档以获取帮助。维护人员将审查拉动请求，并提供有关在将公式添加到Homebrew之前需要解决的所有方面的反馈。
